usx.para: Some modern versions have and in the ruins of the rich, lambs will graze . 18:11 Some later manuscripts add, For the Son of Mana has come to save the lost. But do not allow yourselves to be called ‘Rabbi,’ for you have only one teacher, and you yourselves are all [neut:brothers and sisters./masc:brothers.] 23:14 Some later manuscripts add: Alas for you teachers of the law and Pharisees, hypocrites! You devour widows' property, and pray long prayers just for show! This is why you will receive a more severe punishment. But the rest said, “Wait and let us see if Elijah is coming to save him.”27:49 Some later manuscripts add: However another man took a spear, and pierced his side; and water and blood flowed from it.
